languages.text: "Но прежде, чем ты отправишься навстречу новой участи — у меня есть просьба к тебе и твое{mf|му|й} спутни{mf|ку|це}. Среди моих прихожан немало беднейших, обездоленнейших жителей Футфола. Они донесли до меня тревожные вести из теневых кварталов. В самых темных районах, куда не заглядывают стражи Наместника, поселилась скверна".

traits.locale_text: "Но прежде, чем ты отправишься навстречу новой участи — у меня есть просьба к тебе и твое{mf|му|ей} спутни{mf|ку|це}. Среди моих прихожан немало беднейших, обездоленнейших жителей Футфола. Они донесли до меня тревожные вести из трущоб. В самых темных районах, куда не заглядывают стражи наместника, поселилась скверна".

languages.text: "But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's wardens do not venture, taint has taken root."
languages.original_text: "Но прежде, чем ты отправишься навстречу новой участи — у меня есть просьба к тебе и твое{mf|му|й} спутни{mf|ку|це}. Среди моих прихожан немало беднейших, обездоленнейших жителей Футфола. Они донесли до меня тревожные вести из теневых кварталов. В самых темных районах, куда не заглядывают стражи Наместника, поселилась скверна".

traits.locale_text: "But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from the slums. In their darkest corners, where the Liege's guards do not venture, taint has taken root."

"But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from the slums. In their darkest corners, where the Liege's guards do not venture, taint has taken root."

"But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's guards do not venture, taint has taken root."

"But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's guards do not venture, taint has taken root."

"But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's wardens do not venture, taint has taken root."

languages.text: “但在你踏上新的命运之路之前，我对你和你的同伴有个请求。在我的牧群中，有许多人都是落脚港最贫穷、最一文不名的人。从他们那里，我听到了落脚港阴影区令人不安的消息。在那些最阴暗的角落，在总督的守卫不敢涉足的地方，腐化已经生了根。”
languages.original_text: "But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's wardens do not venture, taint has taken root."

traits.locale_text: “但在你踏上新的命运之路之前，我对你和你的同伴有个请求。在我的牧群中，有许多人都是落脚港最贫穷、最一文不名的人。从他们那里，我听到了落脚港阴影区令人不安的消息。在那些最阴暗的角落，在总督的守卫不敢涉足的地方，腐化已经生了根。”

languages.text: «Pero antes de que parta hacia su nuevo destino, tengo algo que pedirles a usted y a su acompañante. Entre mi rebaño se cuenta gente de las castas más pobres y desfavorecidas de Paso. Me han traído malas noticias de los barrios bajos: en las esquinas más oscuras, por donde no se atreven a pasar los guardianes del señor, la corrupción ha arraigado».
languages.original_text: "But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's wardens do not venture, taint has taken root."

traits.locale_text: «Pero antes de que para hacia su nuevo destino, tengo algo que pedirles a usted y a su acompañante. Entre mi rebaño se cuenta gente de las castas más pobres y desfavorecidas de Paso. Me han traído malas noticias de los barrios bajos: en las esquinas más oscuras, por donde no se atreven a pasar los guardianes del señor, la corrupción ha arraigado».

languages.text: 「ですが、新たな運命へ歩み始める前に、あなたとあなたの仲間にお願いしたいことがあります。私を慕う者の多くは、フットフォールでもっとも貧しく、一切の恵みを与えられてこなかったような人々です。彼らはフットフォールのシャドウクォーターから難儀な知らせを持ってきました。領主のワーデンが足を踏み入れないような暗き場所で、穢れが根を下ろしているのです」
languages.original_text: "But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's wardens do not venture, taint has taken root."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、新たな運命へ歩み始める前に、あなたとあなたの仲間にお願いしたいことがあります。私を慕う者の多くは、フットフォールでもっとも貧しく、一切の恵みを与えられてこなかったような人々です。彼らはフットフォールのシャドウクォーターから難儀な知らせを持ってきました。領主のワーデンが足を踏み入れないような暗き場所で、穢れが根を下ろしているのです」
「ですが、新たな運命へ歩み始める前に、あなたとあなたの仲間にお願いしたいことがあります。私を慕う者の多くは、フットフォールでもっとも貧しく、一切の恵みを与えられてこなかったような人々です。彼らはフットフォールのシャドウクォーターから難儀な知らせを持ってきました。領主のワーデンが足を踏み入れないような暗き場所で、穢れが根を下ろしているのです」

languages.text: "Doch bevor Ihr diesen Weg zu Eurem neuen Schicksal antretet ... habe ich eine Bitte an Euch und {mf|Euren Gefährten|Eure Gefährtin}. Viele in meiner Herde stammen aus den ärmsten Schichten auf Footfall und besitzen nichts. Sie haben mir beunruhigende Nachrichten aus den Schattenquartieren von Footfall gebracht. In den dunkelsten Ecken, die die Wächter des Lehnsherren nicht aufsuchen, hat der Makel Wurzeln geschlagen."
languages.original_text: "But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's wardens do not venture, taint has taken root."

traits.locale_text: "Doch bevor Ihr diesen Weg zu Eurem neuen Schicksal antretet ... habe ich eine Bitte an Euch und {mf|Euren Gefährten|Eure Gefährtin}. Viele in meiner Herde stammen aus den ärmsten Schichten auf Footfall und besitzen nichts. Sie haben mir beunruhigende Nachrichten aus den Schattenquartieren von Footfall gebracht. In den dunkelsten Ecken, die die Wächter des Lehnsherren nicht aufsuchen, hat der Makel Wurzeln geschlagen."

languages.text: « Avant que vous commenciez à emprunter un chemin qui transformera votre destinée... J'aurais toutefois un service à vous demander, ainsi qu'à votre camarade. Je compte parmi mes ouailles certains des citoyens les plus pauvres et opprimés de tout Castel, et ils m'ont informé de choses troublantes au Quartier des Ombres. Dans ses tréfonds, là où les gardes du suzerain n'osent pas s'aventurer, la corruption grandit. »
languages.original_text: "But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's wardens do not venture, taint has taken root."

traits.locale_text: « Avant que vous commenciez à emprunter un chemin qui transformera votre destinée... J'aurais toutefois un service à vous demander, ainsi qu'à votre camarade. Je compte parmi mes ouailles certains des citoyens les plus pauvres et opprimés de tout Castel, et ils m'ont informé de choses troublantes au Quartier des Ombres. Dans ses tréfonds, là où les gardes du suzerain n'osent pas s'aventurer, la corruption grandit. »

languages.text: "Lakin kaderine uzanan yola adım atmadan evvel senden ve yoldaşından bir ricam olacak. Cemaatimin çoğu, Binliman'ın hem madden hem ruhen en yoksul tabakasından oluşur. Binliman'ın Gölge Mahalli'nden bana elim haberler getirdiler. Emîr'in muhafızlarının devriye gezmediği en kuytu, karanlık köşelerde şer kök salıyormuş."
languages.original_text: "But before you start on a path toward your new destiny — I have a request to make of you and your companion. Many among my flock are from the poorest, most dispossessed people on Footfall. They've brought me troubling news from Footfall's Shadow Quarters. In the darkest corners, where the Liege's wardens do not venture, taint has taken root."

traits.locale_text: "Yeni kaderini takip etmeye başlamadan önce senden ve eşlikçinden bir ricam olacak. Binliman'ın en fakir, en boşlanımış insanlarından birçokları benim sürüme dâhildir. Binliman'ın Gölge Mahali'nden bana elim haberler getirdiler. Emîr'in muhafızlarının devriye gezmediği en karanlık köşelerde kirlilik kök salıyormuş."
